email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for a mid-October laycan. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. Our starting freight quote is in the low $50s per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider something in the high $40s? Also, could you confirm the laycan window? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concern about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $49.75 per metric ton, but this is our best and final offer. The laycan window is October 15-20. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $49.75 sounds reasonable. We can proceed with this rate. Could you confirm the demurrage terms? Also, please send over the full vessel details and any additional terms for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that the rate works for you. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. I’ve attached the full vessel details and the charter party terms for your review. Let me know if you need any clarifications. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the documents. Everything looks in order. We’ll proceed with the booking. Please confirm the laycan window of October 15-20 and the final freight rate of $49.75 per metric ton. Also, let’s finalize the demurrage terms at $25,000 per day. Looking forward to your confirmation. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, confirmed. The laycan is October 15-20, freight rate at $49.75 per metric ton, and demurrage at $25,000 per day. I’ll send over the final booking confirmation shortly. Thanks for your business, and let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah
